articles.content:
• Donald Trump called on conservatives to fight for election changes.
  • He wants mail-in and early voting to be curtailed.
  • Trump lost the 2020 election by seven million votes.
articles.description: Former US president Donald Trump has laid out a variety of election proposals, such as limiting absentee voting and days when Americans can vote.
articles.title: Trump proposes new voting limits, rails against 'monster' voting rights bill in comeback speech - News24

articles.author: Jim Tankersley
articles.content: WASHINGTON Senator Elizabeth Warren, Democrat of Massachusetts, plans to introduce legislation on Monday that would tax the net worth of the wealthiest people in America, a proposal aimed at persuadi… [+1106 chars]
articles.description: A tax on the net worth of America’s wealthiest individuals remains popular with voters, but has yet to be embraced by President Biden.
articles.title: Warren Revives Wealth Tax, Citing Pandemic Inequalities - The New York Times

articles.content: File photo: Ex-U.S. President Donald Trump speaks to the press in the James Brady Press Briefing Room at the White House on November 20, 2020 in Washington, DC. U.S. Tasos Katopodis/Getty Images/AFP… [+4672 chars]
articles.description: Donald Trump told conservatives Sunday he was considering running for president again in 2024, as he reasserted dominance over the Republican Party and warned of a “struggle” for America’s very survival. Echoing the grievance politics of his 2016 campaign and…
articles.title: Donald Trump Says He Might Run For US President In 2024 - Channels Television
